summary: This bill, the EO 14155 Act of 2025, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14155. This executive order concerns the withdrawal of the United States from the World Health Organization (WHO). The bill's short title is the EO 14155 Act of 2025. The bill was referred to multiple committees, including Foreign Affairs, Armed Services, Intelligence, and Energy and Commerce, indicating a broad scope of potential impact.
